content: WASHINGTON  Jan 13 The U.S. Navy plans to buy V-22 tiltrotor aircraft built by Boeing Co and Textron Inc's Bell Helicopter unit to replace the older C-2A turboprop aircraft it now uses to ferry passengers and cargo to aircraft carriers  two people  familiar with the issue said late Tuesday.

title: U.S. Navy said to opt for Bell-Boeing V-22s for carrier deliveries
